name: WP Maintenance page
author: kosugikun

sections.description: You can easily place your page into maintenance mode. You can customize and create your own maintenance page.
sections.installation:
This section explains how to install and operate the plugin.

  1. Plug-in file to /wp-content/plugins/WP-Maintenance-page directory or directly install the plug-in from the WordPress plug-in screen.
  2. Enable plug-ins from WordPress “plug-in” screen
  3. Configure the plugin using the setting-> plugin name screen
    (Match your instructions with the desired user flow for plug-in enabled installation, please include the steps necessary for explanation)
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

This section explains how to install and operate the plugin.

  1. Plug-in file to /wp-content/plugins/WP-Maintenance-page directory or directly install the plug-in from the WordPress plug-in screen.
  2. Enable plug-ins from WordPress “plug-in” screen
  3. Configure the plugin using the setting-> plugin name screen
    (Match your instructions with the desired user flow for plug-in enabled installation, please include the steps necessary for explanation)

Is it completely free?

Yes. It is completely free.

Is it customizable?

It is customizable.

  • Time is now displayed in real time above the countdown setting.

1.2.2

  • Add [Plug-in Introduction] tab to setting page
  • Fine fix
    Notifications from plugin development and plugin details can be checked on the [Plugin Introduction] tab.

1.2.1

  • Modify text in plugin
  • We have increased the text in the plug-in that can be translated.

1.2.0

  • Translation is supported.
  • English translation added.
  • The reset button was abolished.
  • Fixed text in plugin

1.1.2

  • I corrected the bug.

1.1.1

  • Change specification of plug-in
  • Settings will be reset as plug-in specification changes.
  • Fixed a bug that conflicts with other plugins

1.0.0
